name: Navy Moves
description:
My name is McArra and I belong to the special pacification forces. My mission: find and destroy a nuclear submarine U-5544 that has unbalanced the forces between the two most powerful Earth armies. The name of the operation is Cephalopod and I have heard that you want to help me in this "easy" mission.

At first, we will be sent near the island where is anchored the submarine awaiting orders. We will swim to the coast, and once there... everything will depend on us.

"Navy Moves" is a one-dimensional side scrolling shooter, and the sequel of "Army Moves" and has the same gaming style.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, DOS, MSX, ZX Spectrum | Combined View

shot.caption: Jump over sea-mines in the rock-hard first level...
Go for some shark-hunting but try not to lose your head.
Deep in the water-caves and the enemies still won't leave you alone.
Fire as many shots as possible at the octopus before it crushes your ship.
You have almost made it to the submarine but a sea monster is blocking your way. Kill it before it eats up the ship.
We have made it to the submarine. Now were do we set up the bomb?
Search clothes of killed enemy-marines and you may find extra ammo or even passwords.
